full_text: Afterwards the former president decried “yet another phase of the greatest witch hunt in the history of our Country”. He also vowed further political activity, saying his movement “has only just begun” https://t.co/c0QrFlStYR

localize.full_text: 事后，这位前总统谴责 "我国历史上最大的猎巫行动的又一阶段"。他还发誓要进一步开展政治活动，说他的运动 "才刚刚开始 "https://t.co/c0QrFlStYR。
事後，這位前總統譴責 "我國曆史上最大的獵巫行動的又一階段"。他還發誓要進一步開展政治活動，說他的運動 "纔剛剛開始 "https://t.co/c0QrFlStYR。
